about_section.about_description: Come and enjoy a different events every week in the gardens
about_section.whole_description: Come have fun with all your friends

termsAndConditions.agreement: I have read and agree to the Terms and Conditions.
termsAndConditions.term-1:
* La Culta is not responsible for the loss of the QR code for the delivery of wristbands. It is the user's responsibility to provide an email address to which they have full access to receive the QR code.
* Refunds are not accepted for any purchases made.
* In case of non-attendance to the event, both the payment and the bracelet are non-refundable and cannot be applied to another event.
termsAndConditions.user-responsability-1: User's Responsibility: The user will be solely responsible for any misuse, loss, or theft of the QR code once it has been delivered. It is important to keep the QR code secure and protected to prevent unauthorized use.
